beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: A big juicy burger, some golden brown french fries, and a pint of your favorite brewskie. What more could you want? That's a beer at 40 different venus with the category of Burger Joint. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 190 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 39!

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 10 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 20 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 5!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 25 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 6.

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 5 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 8)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 9!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 15 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 4! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 60 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 13.

beer.beer_description: A hazy, golden, unfiltered IPA.The low bitterness and late hopping showcase the citrusy, juicy notes of American hops. A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 50 distinct venues!

Celebrating Pride doesn't stop when June ends. Thanks for supporting the Queer community 365 days out of the year by checking in a beer from one of these Queer-owned and Queer-led breweries! Now keep going. Try 5 more for Level 2.
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 100 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 21! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

A blast of tropical aroma is followed by a resiny and balanced flavor. Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 215 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 44!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 470 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 95! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Juice bomb features all the aspects and nuances of full hop flavor, not just bitterness — providing an upfront but easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 15 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 4!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 20 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 5! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Enjoying a nice Night Out on the town? Thanks for taking Untappd along.
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!
